Review.Contenu: I puchased a shiatsu massager & took very good care of it. I used it twice weekly, three times at most, so not excessively heavy use. I purchased it 5 September 2021 & it just stopped working on 17 December 2023 so it appears renpho massagers last 2 years maximum with mild use & probably less with heavy use. This throw away consumerism is beyond a joke. What a waste of money & I really need this as a disabling chronic pain sufferer. So if buying renpho expect to need to buy a replacement at or near 2 year mark. No wonder warranties by renpho are only 1 year. I suspect decent or heavy use means replacement purchase needed just over 1 year when outside of warranty! I might just soothe pain the old fashioned way through alcohol & meds!

This was a huge inconvenience and only added insult to injury. As a result, I lost a considerable amount of money due to Renpho's faulty product and Amazon's lack of proper quality control.In summary, I do not recommend purchasing the RENPHO massage gun from Amazon. The product is poorly made, and the customer service provided by Renpho is non-existent. Additionally, Amazon's inadequate handling of the situation only added to my frustration. Save yourself the hassle and purchase a massage gun from a more reputable brand with better customer support."

Review.Titre: Would not recommend any of their products
Review.Contenu: The Renpho scale does not sync easily to apple health as this company promotes. Their app is horrendous and does not transfer data and is not user friendly. There are so many bad reviews regarding their app with similar issues as recent as January and going up to a year ago; however, their response is "we'll pass this on to our technical department". Doesn't look like they care to listen to their customers. Their customer service is a joke and is usually not available. The first time I called in, I kept getting an answering machine. On the third try, I finally left a message. If you want to return their product, due to the product not functioning as advertised, you could be subject to return shipping and restocking fees. When they did respond to my concerns through email, and provided the steps to connect to Apple Health as though the scale not connecting properly was my fault (I've only had an Iphone for over 10 years and have connected plenty of apps/scales without any issue) they suggested I provide my app account email so that they can forward it to the Technical Team for investigation. I also purchased their food nutrition scale which is a two star at best. It is not user friendly at all. This company definitely makes my top five worst companies I've ordered from, and would never recommend them to anyone.

Review.Titre: This was my third time ordering from…
Review.Contenu: This was my third time ordering from this company. First order delivered fine. Second and third orders were never delivered.

Poor communication unprofessional and incompetent; if I could give them zero stars I would. I ordered the body composition scales from Renpho and when they didn’t turn up within the stated timeframe I contacted them and was informed that the product had been returned to sender. At no point before this, did they contact me to inform me of what had happened or offer a refund. I asked them to resend the product, which they did. I asked for them to provide a tracking number, they did not. Once again, when the product had not turned up within the allotted time frame I contacted them and was informed it had been delivered. They finally provided a tracking number and told me to contact the courier. When I contacted the courier, I was informed that Renpho, had not provided the correct address or my email address, so the post office would have contacted them, rather than me that the item had arrived. Renpho did not pass this information on to me. I like the scales, they are accurate and are exactly what I wanted, however, the frustration, and angst I had to go through to get them was not worth it. I do not recommend dealing with Renpho. Their products might be good, but their poor communication, incompetence and unprofessionalism, is a huge deterrent.

This purchase was the premium leg massager. I've also bought a Bluetooth scale and a Bluetooth tape measure from Renpho, and I've been very happy with those items. They're easy to use, they're accurate, and they communicate well with the Renpho app. Regarding the leg massager, though; in my opinion, I think the advertising copy should be more specific about the fact that this is a compression "massage." I could be wrong, but I think most people think of a massage in terms of a percussive action, or maybe a kneading action, or both, whereas this leg massager is really neither. Instead, it provides steady pressure over the whole area covered by each section (thigh, calf, foot), and progresses, one section at a time. It does provide good -and adjustable- pressure, but it's just not what I think most people would equate with a massage.Renpho customer service is responsive and pleasant to deal with, but I'd suggest purchasing something as expensive as this leg massager from Amazon. The Renpho return policy cost me about $65. This purchase was $80, and I was given the options to 1) return it, at the expense of an estimated $35 restocking fee and $25 shipping, or 2) keep it and take $15 off the price. I'm not blaming Renpho; this policy is probably stated on their website, and I just missed it because I'm not detail-oriented. But it's worth mentioning here

Renpho Foot Spa with Massager.I am diabetic and also have mobility issues. I cannot reach my feet to wash and dry them so I bought this to see if it would help.There are a couple of fundamental design flaws. The removeable cover does not fit well, and it is impossible to use the carry handle with the cover in place.It is very heavy with water in it, and the cable is not very long. I had to plug it into an extension to use it at my desk. Also, it would be handy if there was a cable storage facility, as there is nowhere to put the cable when transporting or storing the unit.I cannot reach the controls when my feet are in the bath under my desk, and the controls are hard to see. It would be helpful if the control buttons were illuminated.To overcome this I used a torch and one of those rubber topped pens you get for touch screens.Getting my feet in was not easy, as there is not much access room.The heater is a nice touch and the bubbles felt good. More importantly after 20 minutes my feet were much cleaner than when they went in.The worst thing about this product is the discomfort caused by the casing putting pressure on my legs during the process. I sat upright to avoid an awkward angle, but it seemed that no matter where I placed my feet, my legs were pressed against the side or the front, which was uncomfortable, bordering on painful. Even after I got my feet out, I could feel the pressure marks on my legs for some time.I wish I had found a better one, and now that I have used it I suppose I can't return it, which is disappointing. I will therefor persevere with this one and hope it gets easier to use as time passes.

I guess it’s better if someone else is doing the measurements for you. Shipping took forever as tracking showed my order bouncing around California for a week.

Review.Titre: Location of my scale was uncertain.
Review.Contenu: Tracking the location of my order was uncertain and uninformative.  Shipping details indicated the order shipped for more than a week.   Query to customer service yielded a canned email that “shipping is delayed.”   Scale did arrive in excellent condition and works as advertised.

Review.Titre: I am quite disappointed in the Renpho…
Review.Contenu: I am quite disappointed in the Renpho scale I recently purchased. I had an old one, which did nothing more than report my current weight.*  I decided to upgrade to a current model, touted by Renpho as offering various options for analyzing the composition of my weight and identifying tendencies over time.  I was especially interested in the prospect of linking the new scale with other health and nutrition trackers, including MyFitnesPal.  Unfortunately, I was unable to get the scale to do any of these things.  All it does is record my current weight.  *The old scale no longer even records my current weight, instead always offering only the same figure--which is less than half of what I actually do weigh!
Looks nothing like the one they use in advertising pictures. Instructions not really clear took a bit to connect to the phone but overall item works Postage was prompt

I have several products.  I LOVE my bathroom scale.  LOVE my kitchen scale.  The air purifier was great until I changed the filter.  I worked with cust service because its under warranty but now they are refusing to help.

Review.Titre: Product is absolutely great, tracking was a let down
Review.Contenu: Product is absolutely great. I ordered a massage gun that was on sale for US$49.99, site auto-added coupons to drop it around US$42, and taxes brought it to an even US$45. It was well packaged and came with no damage at all. So why did I dock a star?The Shopify app is absolute crap for tracking. I ended up throwing the tracking number into a much less robust, but more reliable, app that gave better updates and not full of advertising.

Although we decided not to keep our purchase (personal preference, not any problem with the product), we were satisfied with our experience. Returning it would have cost return shipping and a 15% restocking fee. Instead they offered to reimburse us 65% if we would simply give ot to someone else to use. We found this a very acceptable solution to us, saving us time, and possibly money (shipping costs).

This product is  impressive with high end message speed and message heads. It excels in every aspect except for the charging time. In my experience, it takes over 4 hours (specifically 7-8 hours) to charge using 5W power delivery charger. When fully charged, it delivers high intense message, but the message delivery gradually decreases as the charge starts depleting from 100%. Anyway, R-C001 is great for its price (I paid US $64).

Its a good product but it could be better. It moves slight up the bridge of the nose and interrupts the anticipated and much needed pressure on the sinus area hopefully you all will tweek that and offer a discount or rebate when we turn in the old models 🤷🏾‍♀️

Review.Titre: I found the Renpho Leg Massager Premium okay to use
Review.Contenu: I found the Renpho Leg Massager Premium to be helpful, and provided some relief from the old and achy legs. BUT, it is huge and cumbersome. There is no way to disconnect one leg unit if you only require massaging on one leg, which was my issue. In addition, the foot massager is separate, but attached. Again, you cannot disconnect it. I enjoyed to comfort that it gave to my calf muscles, but being as bulky and cumbersome as it was, giving it 4 stars was a stretch.

Order came as advertised in a reasonabe time. As always, great product.Missing a star only due to communication around delivery. I saw a notice that the order was received and processing; no updates as to when it would be here. Fortunately it came pretty fast and surprised me,

Review.Titre: I ve brought a few of the Renpho items…

Just hoping they last as long (5yrs+).  Both are similiar in weight & Managable handle size.  Have also the digitial scales & work well although having issues with the upgraded app so have reverted back to the first one.

I would've been fine with that timeframe, but there was no communication.  I was being told that my items had both been delivered after 1 week, which had me very nervous that I would never see the second item, which was also a gift for someone.

I really like the product. I've been using the scale every day for the last three weeks or so. It seems to be pretty accurate, and the connection to the app on my iphone is turning out to be quite useful. Since it does the calculations for BMI and body fat percentage automatically, I can save time and keep track of my progress.

I did not end up connecting mine to the app, and it runs manually from the device. I have other Renpho products (smart scale and smart body tape measurer), and I did not have any issues with connecting the bluetooth.

The heating option is good. The vibration function is not good. The air pressure is not strong enough, but okay. The button is sometimes too sensitive that even I laid down one the pillow will change the setting. Overall it’s a good product.

Review.Titre: It’s a great shiatsu massage machine
Review.Contenu: It’s a great shiatsu massage machine. I have used it on my neck and shoulders as well as my calves. The heating option helps with loosening tight muscles. I have given 4stars because you have to plug the machine when using it. A recommendation to Renpho to create a chargeable shiatsu massage machine.

Review.Titre: I use the Renpho every night before…
Review.Contenu: I use the Renpho every night before falling asleep and absolutely love it! I would have given it 5 stars if it wasn't for the noise.  The music does a nice job of covering the noise for the person using it, but not for the person that is trying to sleep next to you.  Also, the buttons are too close together and when I'm changing the programs, I push the wrong button and have to go through the whole series again or sometimes turn it off and back on.  But it really helps relieve the pressure around my eyes and relaxes the muscles.  I fall asleep so much faster and my eyes feel rested when I get up.

There was a long delay before my concern/issue was addressed via email which made the urgent support/help request rather useless.The "eventual" service response was GREAT and you made up for the delay in responding, so I thank you GREATLY.Dave

Review.Titre: Quality built products but software could be improved a little
Review.Contenu: I purchased The Scales, Foot massager and Smart bike in one hit with a 10% off coupon. After spending a few hours for a few nights researching smart bikes and foot massagers. I started to narrow my focus onto the Renpho range. I ended up selecting the Renpho Smart bike because of the reviews on its price, quality build and the fact that it has resistance control via its free app with bonus compatibility with other reputable bike apps like zwift. After trying the App and doing a power test I found it to be quite awesome. As mentioned by the reviews, you do need to download some courses which takes time so better to do it well in advance of training on the bike. The app also has had issues connecting to my apple health app. I haven’t yet sorted that out so the way around it for me is to open the Renpho AI Gym app on my Apple Watch which will record my indoor ride with heart rate. Or alternatively use my Apple Watch indoor bike workout.  My wife is in Love with the Shiatsu foot massager. I personally am not into foot massage machines. The scale are good and do the job well.  The software unfortunately doesn’t support my body type which is very athletic. But I’m probably not the target market. I still find much of the stats good even if it does think I’m overweight which is because of my muscle mass. Keep up the great work Renpho And please address issues with frequent updates. Highly recommend the brand based on price, quality and after purchase support. Software isn’t perfect yet but I know they are really trying to make everything work.
Good quality air purifier and replacement filters, quality packaging and fast shipping. The filters could have a bit thicker density for the carbon layer.

I find the lighter massage combined with heat is awesome for relieving a tension/migraine headache and calming sinus pressure.  Would I purchase the Renpho again, definitely?

I would rather just pick if I want that because of migraines. I can't stand the noise, and I cant put it on my eyes because it's too painful. I just wear it right above for the air pressure massage only.  Other than that it is great. I will probably order one for my brother who has severe MS. His medications gives him migraines. Very useful and helpful for headaches and migraines

Purchased a Renpho Shiatsu Foot Massager Pro+ direct from the company on-line. The control panel did not work.Renpho replaced the item within a week, but there were some odd requests:1. Submit a video displaying the fault.2. Submit a photograph of the power adaptor. I did this, but questioned why as the adaptor came with the unit.3. Reach inside the unit and press the buttons from the inside??? This I didn't do explaining that I didn't want to damage any circuitry and wanted a unit that worked as intended.4. A further email was received requesting the serial number of the defective unit.Once the above was done Renpho sent me a replacement, stating that there was no requirement to return the defective item.The replacement was delivered by Amazon interestingly enough.

Review.Titre: Nirvana for Your Eyes and Mind
Review.Contenu: I received the Renpho eye-massager for this past Christmas from my husband, a great guy who is always at a loss as to what to buy for me that might be a surprise. One early December Sunday, we were watching the CBS morning show that included a review by David Pogue of cool, new  "techno" gifts. As I oohed and aahed through the segment, my hubby was taking mental notes, and actually surprised me with a few of the reviewed products - one being the Renpho Eye Massager. Oh my goodness! I had no idea what the box contained, but my husband instructed me to just open up the headset and put it over my eyes. At once, the soft pads went to work, massaging pressure points around my eyes and temples while soothing sounds (which may be turned off) piped through the unit. It was absolutely heavenly! Stress, headaches, and tight muscles melt away while you're under the relaxing spell of the massager.After I finished my minutes of Nirvana, I took off the headset and passed it around so my family members could try it out. They loved it so much that our adult daughter ordered her own set after she returned home, and I went on to purchase another set as a gift. I highly recommend the Renpho Eye Massager. It's a perfect gift and a welcomed antidote for the over-worked and media-weary friends in your life. : )
